body:
What do you wish for in the next avicus website update?
I hope for searchable forum discussions, clans tab in forums, also (not totally related) but an in game message that say "visit the avicus forums, avicus.net/forums", so newer players become more involved
body_tagged:

title: website development

replies.body:
-The clans section with scrimmage scheduling.
-Notifications of replies to a post
-Clan leaderboard
-Map gallery:description, picture etc..
-Tutorial for each gamemode
-Youtube area ex. Showcase Tynvale's videos.
-Video recording of clan scrims?
-Individual leaderboard in scrims/tourneys

replies.body:
Monument/Objective leaderboard
Also, I agree about the Map gallery, and maybe also pictures of old/removed maps to be remembered

replies.body:
- Adding friends (obviously the most important thing).
- Private and group messaging.
- Alerts (for friends requests, messages, ect).
- As others have suggested, a clan and scrimmage section would be nice.
